rules.description: change capslock to hyper, escape if pressed alone, and universal reset state

to.shell_command:
yabai -m window --toggle float && \
                        /tmp/yabai-restore/$(yabai -m query --windows --window | jq -re '.id').restore \
                        2>/dev/null || true
osascript -e 'display notification "Toggle Float Window" with title "Yabai!"'

yabai -m window --toggle float && \
                        /tmp/yabai-restore/$(yabai -m query --windows --window | jq -re '.id').restore \
                        2>/dev/null || true
osascript -e 'display notification "Toggle Float Window" with title "Yabai!"'

yabai -m query --spaces \
                                | jq -re '.[] | select(.visible == 1).index' \
                                | xargs -I{} yabai -m query --windows --space {} \
                                | jq -sre 'add | sort_by(.display, .frame.x, .frame.y, .id) | reverse | nth(index(map(select(.focused == 1))) - 1).id' \
                                | xargs -I{} yabai -m window --focus {}
yabai -m window --focus stack.next || yabai -m window --focus next || yabai -m window --focus first
yabai -m window --focus stack.next || yabai -m window --focus next || yabai -m window --focus first
yabai -m window --focus stack.prev || yabai -m window --focus prev || yabai -m window --focus last
yabai -m window --focus stack.prev || yabai -m window --focus prev || yabai -m window --focus last
yabai -m window --focus stack.prev || yabai -m window --focus stack.last
yabai -m window --focus stack.prev || yabai -m window --focus stack.last
yabai -m window --focus stack.next || yabai -m window --focus stack.first
yabai -m window --focus stack.next || yabai -m window --focus stack.first

yabai -m space --layout $(yabai -m query --spaces --space \
                         | jq -r 'if .type == "bsp" then "stack" else "bsp" end')

yabai -m space --layout $(yabai -m query --spaces --space \
                         | jq -r 'if .type == "bsp" then "stack" else "bsp" end')

yabai -m window --toggle sticky && \
                        yabai -m window --toggle topmost && \
                        yabai -m window --toggle pip

yabai -m window --toggle sticky && \
                        yabai -m window --toggle topmost && \
                        yabai -m window --toggle pip

yabai -m space --create && \
                                  index=$(yabai -m query --spaces --display | jq 'map(select(."native-fullscreen" == 0))[-1].index') && \
                                  yabai -m space --focus $index
yabai -m window --space prev && yabai -m space --focus prev
yabai -m window --space next && yabai -m space --focus next
